page.title: 13CUB SCOUTS
page.content: A number of boys from the Instow area are members of the Fremington Cub Pack. There are two packs one called the Spitfires and one called the Jaguars. The Spitfire pack meets on Thursdays and the Jaguar pack meets on Tuesdays, both from 6.15 until 8 o'clock in the evening. Cubs are groups of boys who wear uniforms and take part in various organised activities. Every year they go on a Camp. The uniform consists of a green cap, green jersey, blue and white scarf, grey shorts and long grey socks.
